an8.59:1.1: “Atthime, bhikkhave, puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa?
an8.59:1.3: Sotapanno, sotapattiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno, sakadagami, sakadagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno, anagami, anagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno, araha, arahattaya patipanno.
an8.59:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha puggala ahuneyya …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassati.
